prompt: Develop a map view page with a full-screen map and a modern dark theme. Include a top app bar with the title 'Dark Map' in white text, a black background (Colors.black), and a white back arrow icon. Add a floating action button in the top-right corner with a green GPS icon (Colors.green) and a dark grey background (Colors.grey[900]). The map area should have a dark background (Colors.grey[900]) with a subtle white grid overlay (simulated with a semi-transparent Container). Use Material Design principles, ensuring high contrast and a sleek, futuristic aesthetic. Add a 4px padding around the map container for spacing.
